---
title: "BN Notes"
subtitle: Exploratory notes and analysis for Beyond Notability
listing:
  - id: everything
    contents:
    - "notes/*.qmd"
    - posts
    sort: "date desc"
    exclude: 
      title: "Other Notes"
    type: table
    fields: [date, title, file-modified, categories]
    field-display-names:
      file-modified: "Updated"
    categories: true
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    date-format: "D MMM YYYY"
    page-size: 99
toc: false
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
execute: 
  warning: false
  message: false
  echo: false 
---

This is a work-in-progress data blog by [Sharon Howard](https://sharonhoward.org) for the [Beyond Notability wikibase](https://beyond-notability.wikibase.cloud/wiki/Main_Page), August 2023-December 2024.


## Posts and Notes

[Posts](blog.qmd): short pieces on specific topics or questions 

[Notes](notes/): overviews, summary tables and other Stuff
